statement.p: The four sequential sides of a quadrilateral have lengths \displaystyle{a}={5.2}, \displaystyle{b}={6.5}, \displaystyle{c}={9.2}, and \displaystyle{d}={11.8} (all measured in yards). The angle between the two smallest sides is \displaystyle\alpha={93}^\circ.
What is the area of this quadrilateral?
